name: Grimlock

traits.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Spiked Bone Club
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage.

senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)
